product.title: Aladdin and the Missing Jewel Chest | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Aladdin and the Missing Jewel Chest

Mickey and Minnie take on cameo roles as Aladdin and Aladdin’s wife in this magical tale that’s sure to spark up the whimsical fancies of young readers. When a wicked magician captures Aladdin’s lamp and his wife’s chest of jewels, Aladdin elicits the help of his magic medal to come to his rescue. This whimsical story demonstrates to your child the boundless power of the imagination.

Tie-In Activity: Retell the story of Aladdin’s lamp to your child, and then ask him to share the three wishes he would choose.
